definitions: the part of a telephone apparatus contained in the earpiece, in which electrical signals are converted into sounds.
shortDefinitions: part of telephone apparatus contained in earpiece, in which electrical signals are converted into sounds

definitions: a piece of radio or television apparatus that detects broadcast signals and converts them into visible or audible form
shortDefinitions: piece of radio or television apparatus that detects broadcast signals

definitions: a person who gets or accepts something that has been sent or given to them
shortDefinitions: person who gets or accepts something that has been sent or given to them

definitions: a person who buys or accepts stolen goods in the knowledge that they have been stolen

examples.text: he's the biggest receiver of stolen jewels in London

shortDefinitions: person who buys or accepts goods known to be stolen

definitions: (in tennis and similar games) the player to whom the ball is served to begin play.
shortDefinitions: (in tennis and similar games) player to whom ball is served to begin play

definitions: a player who catches a pass or a kick.
shortDefinitions: player who specializes in catching passes

definitions: a person or company appointed by a court to manage the financial affairs of a business or person that has gone bankrupt

examples.text: the company is in the hands of the receivers

shortDefinitions: person or company appointed by court to manage financial affairs of business or person that has gone bankrupt

definitions: a container for collecting the products of distillation, chromatography, or other process.
shortDefinitions: container for collecting products of process

definitions: the part of a firearm which houses the action and to which the barrel and other parts are attached.
shortDefinitions: part of firearm which houses action and to which barrel and other parts are attached
